channel.title: Major help!
channel.description: i want to make my own loign message liek compleaty diffrent not the way liek when u change one already my own. how do i dod tht. what i did was i coped the one tht was done and paseted then put my own. but tht didnt work. so help me out and tell me how to add my own please

item.title: Major help!
item.dc:creator: @_Ganon `Ganon
item.description:
@_Ganon wrote:

Final Dawn:

I didn’t spoonfeed him I just simply told him where to search and for what to search and explained how to put more then one line of code in. I believe in helping people more then just saying “Go learn it.”

You taught him almost nothing, I don’t care how you teach people but don’t say my method dose not teach anything…

I doubt he knows what a String is… If he learns this it would be way easier for him to understand examples which is proven the fastest way to learn.

Read full topic

item.title: Major help!
item.dc:creator: @_Ganon `Ganon
item.description:
@_Ganon wrote:

[quote=“Final Dawn, post:5, topic:293742”][quote author=`Ganon link=topic=388656.msg2905355#msg2905355 date=1249762105]

i mean like make my own liek i have atm and i want a 3rd one…

Learn some Java, and some English please…

Java.sun.com
[/quote]

This is a help topic not a tell people to go learn java…Anyway

If you go into client.java and search for what your welcome message that is in the server right now, then you can change it but make sure you keep the "s they are needed

example: “Welcome to myscape!”

So just change the Welcome to myscape to whatever you wish it to say
Or if you want more then one line for it to say then copy all of the line including the

sM(“asdfasdfasdf”);

or

sendMessage(“asdfasdf”);

and just paste it right under the other line. The order you put the lines in is the order that the server will send them to the players.

Any further questions feel free to ask. I’m here all week(Actually forever just like to say that xD).[/quote]

This is also not a spoon-feeding topic. Java.sun.com will help him allot, if it was a more complex problem I would attempt to personally help him by examples… But clearly he would not understand any examples I may present. Therefore he needs to learn some basics.

Read full topic

item.title: Major help!

i mean like make my own liek i have atm and i want a 3rd one…
[/quote]

Learn some Java, and some English please…

Java.sun.com[/quote]

This is a help topic not a tell people to go learn java…Anyway

If you go into client.java and search for what your welcome message that is in the server right now, then you can change it but make sure you keep the "s they are needed

example: “Welcome to myscape!”

So just change the Welcome to myscape to whatever you wish it to say
Or if you want more then one line for it to say then copy all of the line including the

sM(“asdfasdfasdf”);

or

sendMessage(“asdfasdf”);

and just paste it right under the other line. The order you put the lines in is the order that the server will send them to the players.

Any further questions feel free to ask. I’m here all week(Actually forever just like to say that xD).
